response.original_title: SpiderMable - a real life superhero story
response.overview: Tragedy strikes, a superpower is revealed, and the hero must come to terms with their new abilities. That's the story arc of great comic book heroes. It's also the real-life journey of a selfless 6-year-old cancer patient's desire to help others even while she is in the battle of her life. SpiderMable - a real life superhero story is a feature documentary following cancer-fighter Mable Tooke who lives out her dream of fighting crime with her hero Spider-Man and is then thrust into the realm of celebrity after her wish day becomes a viral sensation. Mable must learn to manage her newfound popularity and harness her power in an attempt to give back to the community that is helping her survive.
response.title: SpiderMable - a real life superhero story
